main event: A UFO sighting involving a round object with jagged edges observed in July 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared in colors of red, orange, yellow, and blue and rippled as a bright light.,The sighting lasted for twenty minutes and involved one stationary object.,A pilot from a local FIP squadron made repeated passes over the location.,Observers used binoculars which may have affected their perception of the object's colors and size.,Possible explanations for the sighting included the moon obscured by clouds or Saturn visible through haze.
sighted object: one round object with jagged outer edges
witness description: Observers included a pilot and possibly civilian witnesses using binoculars.
